title: Create an L1 Registered Player
custom_preconds:
Verify the creation of a L1 player is Pending BOC Review.

Login as BOC
custom_steps:
1. Fill in all required fields  in Create New Widget
Note: Players DOB MUST BE AFTER 9/1/1995 - for L1 Registration

2. Click "Register"

3. Verify profile loaded

4. Fill in all required fields 

5. Attach two files Label one file as Birth Certificate and second file as Registration Consent Form

6. Click "Register"
custom_expected:
1. Verify that all required fields behave correctly. 

2. The "Next" button should change to "Register" because of the DOB entered.

3. The International Amateur Player profile should be displayed in edit mode. Data from the widget should have been populated in to the profile.

4. Verify that all required fields behave correctly

5. Files should have correct labels.
 
6. The status of the player should be "pending BOC review". Player should also appear in Registration Admin widget with the same status

title: Open profile for player created
custom_steps:
1. Locate Registration Admin widget

2. Find player you registered and open profile

3. Verify Eligible to Sign Date and Meets Age Requirement Date
custom_expected:
1. Registration Admin widget should be displayed.

2. Player should be displayed and profile should opened

3. Verify players Eligible to Sign Date should display the starting date of the international signing period for the particular year. Verify players Meets Age requirement date should display the date the player will be eligible to sign a contract

title: Edit L1 Player
custom_steps:
1. Click Edit on Player Profile 

2. Change some Data 

3. Click Save
custom_expected:
1.. Profile should go to editable mode after clicking edit.

2. User is able to make changes

3. A blue notification should be displayed "Profile Saved Successfully". Verify profile displays new information

Note-A CLUB should not be able to edit Bio Info and National ID

title: Delete L1 Player
custom_steps:
1. Locate Registration Admin widget

2. Find player you created and open profile

3. Click Delete button

4. Click Yes. Verify Second warning message

6. Confirm deletion by clicking Delete
custom_expected:
1. Registration Admin widget should be displayed.

2. Profile should be loaded in View only mode. There should be a delete button at the bottom of the screen. 

3. A warning popup appears advising that the player will be permanently removed from system. 

4. Confirm yes for deletion loads a second warning.

5. Clicking Delete on second warning should remove the player from the system and a blue notificaiton should display "Player Deleted Successfully" 

6. Check Advanced Search to verify player has been deleted.

title: Create a Grandfather Player
custom_steps:
1. Fill in all required fields  
Note: Players DOB MUST BE BEFORE 9/1/1995

2. Click "Next"

3. Fill in all required fields 

4. Click Save
custom_expected:
1. Verify that all required fields behave correctly. When a DOB before the 9/1/1995 is entered in the widget the following message appears "Player is not subject to Level 1 Registration"

2. The International Amateur Player profile should be displayed in edit mode. Data from the widget should have been populated in to the profile.

3. Verify that all required fields behave correctly.

4. Player should be created and a Blue Notification window should be displayed.

title: Verify Club cannot edit Grandfathered Player
custom_steps:
1. Locate Grandfathered player you created and open profile

2. Click Edit
custom_expected:
1. Player profile should be displayed in view only mode

2. Verify user is presented with a block message and are unable to edit profile. Error message displays saying edits must be made in ebis1.

title: Create L1 player as club
custom_steps:
1. Login

2. Locate Create New widget 

3. Select International Amateur Player from Dropdown

4. Fill in all required fields  
Note: Players DOB MUST BE AFTER 9/1/1995 - for L1 Registration

5. Click "Register"

6. Fill in all required fields 

7. Attach two files Label one file as Birth Certificate and second file as Consent Form

8. Click Save
custom_expected:
1. International Dashboard should be displayed.

2. Create New Widget should be displayed

4. Verify that all required fields behave correctly. 

5. The "Next" button should change to "Register" because of the DOB entered.

6. The International Amateur Player profile should be displayed in edit mode. Data from the widget should have been populated in to the profile.

7. Files should have correct labels.
 
8. The status of the player should be "pending BOC review". Player should also appear in Club Registration List widget with the same status

title: Open profile for player created
custom_preconds:
Verify the creation of an L1  Registered Player

Login as Club
custom_steps:
1. Locate Club Registration List widget

2. Find player you registered

3. Verify Eligible to Sign Date and Meets Age Requirement Date
custom_expected:
1. Club Registration Widget should be displayed

2. Player should be visible

3. Verify players Eligible to Sign Date should display the starting date of the international signing period for the particular year. Verify players Meets Age requirement date should display the date the player will be eligible to sign a contract

title: Verify Club can Edit L1 Player
custom_steps:
1. Locate Club Registration List widget

2. Find player you created

3. Open profile and click Edit

4. Change some data

5. Click Save
custom_expected:
1. Club Registration Widget should be displayed

2. Player should be visible

3. The International Amateur Player profile should load in view mode only. Profile should go to editable mode after clicking edit.

4. User is able to make changes to contact information ONLY. They cannot make edits to Bio Information or attached files 
    NOTE- Clubs will only be able to make edits to Attached files section when the Player Profile has a Registration Status of Corrections Needed 

5. A blue notification should be displayed "Profile saved successfully". Verify profile displays new information

title: Create a Grandfather Player as a Club
custom_steps:
1. Fill in all required fields  
Note: Players DOB MUST BE BEFORE 9/1/1995

2. Click "Next"

3. Fill in all required fields 

4. Click Save
custom_expected:
1. Verify that all required fields behave correctly. When a DOB before the 9/1/1995 is entered in the widget the following message appears "Player is not subject to Level 1 Registration"

2. The International Amateur Player profile should be displayed in edit mode. Data from the widget should have been populated in to the profile.

3. Verify that all required fields behave correctly.

4. Player should be created and a Blue Notification window should be displayed.

title: Create a Hidden Profile
custom_preconds: Note: Hidden Profiles are grandfathered profiles that ONLY the BOC can see
custom_steps:
1. Login as BOC

2. Locate Create New widget 

3. Fill in all required fields 
Note: DOB must be BEFORE 9/1/1995

4. Hidden Checkbox will appear. Check “Hidden Profile” checkbox. 

5. Click “Next”

6. When Profile loads in edit mode, Fill in all required fields

  NOTE: Do NOT check the "Participated in MLB Showcase" checkbox. This 
will override the "Hidden Profile" checkbox and make the player visible 
to clubs 

7. Click “Save”

8. Login as Club user and advanced search for Hidden Profile
custom_expected:
1. Home Dashboard should be displayed. 

2. Create New widget should be displayed

3. Fields behave correctly

4. Hidden Player checkbox is available when DOB is BEFORE 9/1/1995

5. Data from widget should be populated into profile. 

6. Fields behave correctly

7. A hidden profile should be created for the player. A Blue Notification window should be displayed. 

8. Verify that a Club cannot see hidden player

title: Reveal a hidden player to users
custom_steps:
1. Locate Hidden Players widget 

2. Find and Select Hidden Player you created

3. Click Reveal

4. Click OK to Confirm

5. Login as club and advanced search for player
custom_expected:
1. Hidden Players widget should be displayed

2. Player should be visible and selected

3. Player should be removed from the Hidden Player widget.

4. The player should now be seen by all users.

5. Player should appear in advanced search

title: Set an L1 Player's Registration Status to Pre-Verified
custom_steps:
1. Locate Registration Admin widget

2. Find Player who's Registration Status is Pending BOC review 
NOTE: use a player who club-ari-intl or club-nyy-intl registered for later test cases

3. Click 'Edit'

4. Locate Registration Reviews Section

5. Select 'Pre-Verified' in First Review 

6. Click Save
custom_expected:
1. Registration Admin widget should be displayed

2. Player profile should be displayed in view only mode. 

3. After clicking edit the profile should become editable.

4. “Registration Reviews” will display current status of verification. Only the 1st review should be displayed.

5. User is able to Select 'Pre-Verified'

6. Saving profile should set the Registration Status of the profile to Pre-Verified.

title: Set an L1 Player's Registration Status to Corrections Needed
custom_steps:
1. Open Player profile who's status was set to Pre-Verified 

2. Click 'Edit'

3. Locate Registration Reviews

4. Set 2nd Review Status to one of the Corrections Needed Statuses 

5. Click Save
custom_expected:
1. Player profile should be displayed in view only mode. 

2. After clicking edit the profile should become editable.

3. “Registration Reviews” will display current status of verification. 

4. By selecting a status of “Correction Needed” a comments field should appear.

5. Upon clicking Save a Blue Notification should appear. Players Registration Status should update to Corrections Needed

title: Club updated Corrections needed profile- Status is set to Resubmitted to BOC
custom_steps:
1. Locate Club Registration List widget

2. Find Player that BOC set to corrections needed and open profile

3. Make changes

4. Click Save
custom_expected:
1. Club Registration widget should be display with players that club has registered

2. Player profile should display with Registration Status of Corrections needed

3 Club can edit Contact Info and attached files

4. The Status of profile should now be resubmitted to BOC

title: Set an L1 Player's Registration Status to Verified
custom_steps:
1. Open Player Profile that Club Resubmitted to BOC for review

2. Click 'Edit'

3. Locate Registration Reviews

4. Select 'Verified' for Second Review

5. Click Save
custom_expected:
1. Player profile should be displayed in view only mode. 

2. After clicking edit the profile should become editable.

3. “Registration Reviews” will display current status of verification. Second review should be visible and First review should be uneditable

4. User is able to select 'Verified'

5. Saving profile should set the Player's Registration Status to Verified

title: Set Final Review of L1 Player to verified
custom_steps:
1. Open Player Profile who's status was set to Verified on 2nd Review

2. Click 'Edit'

3. Locate Registration Reviews

4. Select 'Verified' for Final Review

5. Click Save
custom_expected:
1. Player profile should be displayed in view only mode. 

2. After clicking edit the profile should become editable.

3. “Registration Reviews” will display current status of verification. Final review should be visible.
First and Second review should be uneditable.

4. User is able to select 'Verified'

5. Profile should be saved. Reviews should be complete and uneditable

title: Make player available to all user who search for them
custom_steps:
1. Locate Registration Admin widget

2. Find Player and open profile

3. Click 'Make Public' and confirm that you want to make the player public 

4. Log in as club and search for player
custom_expected:
1. Registration Admin Widget should be visible

2. Player profile should be displayed in view only mode. 

3. The player should now be public and available for all users to search them

4. Player should appear in search for club to view

title: Add them to BOC's Club Registration List from the player match pop up
custom_steps:
1. Create a International Amateur Player that has already been created by another CLUB so that it results in a player match

2. Click Register

3. Select Existing Player from match pop up

4. Verify 'Add To Club Reg List' button become active

5. Click 'Add To Club Reg List'

6. Add Contact Information and Attached Files

7. Click Save
custom_expected:
1. Create New widget should be displayed

2. Verify 'Matches' pop window displayed

3. Existing player is selectable

4. Add to Club Reg List become active

5. Player profile should be opened in edit mode with the BIO Information populated but should be editable.

6. Contact Information and Attached Files should be blank and editable.

7. Clicking save should add the player to the registration list

title: Merge Two Registration Profiles
custom_steps:
1. Login

2. Locate “Registration Admin” widget 

3. Find the two profiles that match and click the tick box next to their names

4. Click “Merge”

5. View Merged Profile
custom_expected:
1. International Dashboard should be displayed. 

2. Registration Admin widget should be displayed

3. Players are selected

4. A prompt to confirm you want to merge the profiles should be displayed. User should have the options to select which of the following they would like as 'Master' in the merged profile:

- Bio Information
- Contact Information
- Birth Certificate and Consent Form (if applicable)

5.Profile should now displayed the selected Master information. BOC user should still be able to see all the submitted Contact Information and Files for that player. CLUB should only see the Contact Information and Files they submitted

title: Create Trainer Profile
custom_steps:
2. Locate Trainers/Agents widget 

3. Click Create New

4. Fill in all required fields 

5. Click Save
custom_expected:
2. Trainer/Agent widget should be displayed

3. Trainer/Agent profile should be displayed 

4. Fields behave correctly

5. A Blue Notification should appear advising “Trainer has been successfully submitted”. The Trainer/Agent should now be visible in the widget

title: Verify the changes are updated
custom_steps:
2. Locate Trainers/Agents widget 

3. Click on a Trainer/Agent

4. Click Edit

5. Makes some changes to profile 

6. Click Save
custom_expected:
2. Trainer/Agent widget should be displayed

3. The Trainer/Agent profile should be displayed in view mode

4. Profile should be editable

5. User should be able to make changes

6. Find the Trainer/Agent in the widget and verify the updates have been saved by opening their profile

title: Verify profile is removed from system
custom_steps:
1. Locate Trainers/Agents widget 

2.  Click on a Trainer/Agent

3. Click Delete

4. Click Yes
custom_expected:
2. Trainer/Agent widget should be displayed

3. The Trainer/Agent profile should be displayed in view mode

4. A prompt should be displayed “Are you sure” with “Yes” and “Back” buttons.

5. A Notification should be displayed to user “Trainer/Agent has been successfully deleted”.

title: Add Player to L2 Possibility - via profile
custom_steps:
2. Find a player and Open their profile

3. Click Edit

4. Mark checkbox “L2 Possibility” 

5. Click “Save”
custom_expected:
2. The Player profile should be displayed in view mode until edit is clicked.

3. Profile should become editable.

4. Checkbox should populate

5. A blue notification appears to advise changes have been saved. The player should now appear in “Possible L2 List” widget

title: Add Player to L2 Possibility - via widget
custom_steps:
2. Locate “Registration Admin” widget 

3. Select one or more players and check the checkboxes

4. Click “L2 Possibility”
custom_expected:
1. International Dashboard should be displayed. 

2. Registration Admin widget should be displayed

3. The checkboxes should populate next to the players names. 

4. A Blue Notification appears to advised players have been added. The players should now appear in the "Possible L2 List” widget"

title: Select a player for L2 Registration
custom_steps:
2. Locate “Possible L2 List” widget 

3. Scroll along in the table find column 'Selected'

4. Click “Select” for a player

5. Select Org(s) from drop down that selected the player for L2 Registration

6. Click Ok
custom_expected:
2. Possible L2 List widget should be displayed

3. Selected Column should be visible

4. A popup should be displayed to prompt user to select a ORGS. 

5. A dropdown list should be visible with CLUBs listed

6. The Org(s) should appear in the “Possibile L2 List” widget under the Selected By Orgs Column

title: Elevate a player to L2
custom_steps:
2. Locate “Possible L2” widget 

3. Scroll along in the table 

4. Click “Elevate” for a player

5. Enter a date 

6. Click “Save”
NOTE: if BOC (all) was Selected for player- then this player will drop of the L2 Possibility Widget

7. Verify date in Elevate column
custom_expected:
2. Possible L2 List widget should be displayed

3. Elevate Column should be visible

4. A popup should be displayed for the user to select a date. 

5. This date will be the date the player was Level 2 Registered.

6. The “Elevate” button should be replaced with the date you selected.

7. The Elevate date should be editable by clicking in the cell

title: Requests Investigation Results
custom_steps:
2. Locate “L2 Registration List” widget 

3. Click “Request” in “Request Results (Investigation)” column
custom_expected:
1. International Dashboard should be displayed. 

2. L2 Registration List widget should be displayed

3. The date the request took place should be in the place of the Request button.

title: Requests Drug Test Results
custom_steps:
2. Locate “L2 Registration List” widget 

3. Click “Request” in “Request Results (DrugsTest)” column
custom_expected:
1. International Dashboard should be displayed. 

2. L2 Registration List widget should be displayed

3. The date the request took place should be in the place of the Request button.

title: Club user downloads template
custom_steps:
1. User clicks Upload List on "Club Registration List" widget 
2. User clicks Download Template
custom_expected:
1. Pop up message displays, user can upload spreadsheet or download template 
2. The system downloads an excel spreadsheet template for use in multiple player submission to the user's computer.

title: Club User uploads list
custom_steps:
1. User clicks Upload list on "Club registration list" 
2. User selects file and clicks upload
custom_expected:
1. Pop up message displays, user can upload spreadsheet or download template
2. System processes the submitted file. System adds to the Org's Club Registration List (tags) each player that appears in the spreadsheet AND has been registered and has been at least Pre-Verified. (Same rules as via Create New - see specific rules here). System creates a results spreadsheet that is available for download via the Notifications widget that has a results column that specifies whether a player is "Registered" or "Not Yet Registered".
